si.title: மீண்டும் குறைவடையவுள்ள கடன், வைப்பு வட்டி வீதங்கள்?
body_lines: බැංකු පොලී අනුපාත යළිත් අඩු කළ යුතුද?මිනිසුන්ට ණය ලබා ගැනීමට කාලයයි?ණය සඳහා පොලී අනුපාතය අඩු වේද?ඒ හා සමානව, තැන්පතු සඳහා පොලී අනුපාතය ...

en.title: Debt and deposit interest rates to decline again?
body_lines: Will bank interest rates be reduced again?Is it time for people to get loans?Will the interest rate on loans decrease?Similarly, the interest rate for deposits ...

summary_lines: Debt and deposit interest rates may decline again, prompting speculation on potential loan and bank interest rate reductions.
